page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN BRANSTON
page.content: We asked 52 children in school what their dads did for a living.Engineer and mechanic were the most popular jobs.With having 3 air fields near by there were a lot of Service Personnel. Also with a lot of farms in Branston there were a lot of farmworkers.Out of the 52 children we asked 2 of their dads were unemployed and 2 self employed.We also asked 31 children what their mums did for a living.Most of their mums were housewives,but because there are 11 shops in Branston a lot of their mums are shopworkers.We also tried to work out which jobs were manual and non-manual.Most jobs were manual.For example,engineer,factory worker,farmworker and service personnel.We decided that non-manual jobs were,teacher,officeworker, bankworker and Insurance Agent.
